title.rendered: Residence Inn Fayetteville Celebrates Renovation with Ribbon Cutting Ceremony

content.rendered:
Reimagined spaces spark community connection inside grand renovation reveal

FAYETTEVILLE, N.C., April 24, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — The Residence Inn by Marriott Fayetteville Cross Creek, NC celebrated its extensive renovation with a ribbon-cutting event on Tuesday, April 16, 2024. The property, located at 1468 Skibo Road, debuted its significant upgrades surrounded by community guests and local business leaders.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/residence-inn-fayetteville-celebrates-renovation-with-ribbon-cutting-ceremony-302126575.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
